allow:
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from sql_injection_detector import SQLInjectionEnsemble, SQLSemanticAnalyzer

detector = SQLInjectionEnsemble\(\)
analyzer = SQLSemanticAnalyzer\(\)

cases = [
    ''C:/Users/Admin'',
    ""x'' AND y'' OR z''"",
    ""''OR''1''=''1""
]

for c in cases:
    print\(f''\\nQuery: {repr\(c\)}''\)
    sem = analyzer.calculate_semantic_score\(c\)
    print\(f''Semantic: {sem}''\)
    r = detector.detect\(c\)
    print\(f''Result: {r[""decision""]}/{r[""action""]} | S={r[""score""]:.2f} | P_rf={r[""P_rf""]:.2f} | P_cnn={r[""P_cnn""]:.2f}''\)
")
